projectPurpose: To provide a collection of high-performance tools (parser, linter, formatter, transformer, minifier, resolver) for JavaScript and TypeScript development by leveraging the Rust programming language.
mainFeatures: Collection of tools: linter, formatter, transformer, minifier, resolver
Aims to be a unified, fast toolchain

alternatives.name: ESLint
mainFeatures: Supports JavaScript, TypeScript, JSX, CSS, JSON, Markdown

alternatives.name: Prettier
mainFeatures: Supports many languages (JS, TS, CSS, HTML, etc.)
Integrates with editors and build tools

marketPositioning: Oxc positions itself as a high-performance, unified toolchain for JavaScript and TypeScript, built in Rust to achieve industry-leading speeds, particularly in parsing. It aims to compete with or replace collections of existing tools (like ESLint, Prettier, Babel, Terser) and other performance-focused toolchains (like SWC and esbuild) by offering a faster, integrated alternative for core development tasks such as linting, formatting, and transpilation. Its focus on a complete, fast suite built on a modern language like Rust is its key differentiator in the market.
